snippet.title: Showcase Of The Immortals | WWE 2K24 Official Trailer | 2K
snippet.description:
Dive into the infectious energy and nostalgia of five decades of the greatest spectacle in sports entertainment, WrestleMania. On March 8th, step into the boots of WWE’s biggest icons, battling through 21 matches across five decades of WrestleMania history in the WWE 2K24 Showcase! 

For details on physical availability of WWE 2K24: Deluxe Edition, please visit wwe.2k.com/2k24/deluxe-edition-release-dates/

Pre-order #WWE2K24 now: https://wwe.2k.com/2k24/buy/
Follow us to be the first to know:

Instagram  https://instagram.com/wwegames
Twitter https://twitter.com/WWEgames
TikTok  https://www.tiktok.com/@wwegames
Facebook  https://www.facebook.com/WWEgames
Threads  https://www.threads.net/WWEgames

#WWE2K24 #FinishYourStory #WWE
